meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spare or scant.
meanings.sent1: The spareness of the room made it feel spacious.
meanings.sent2: The spareness of the cupboard indicated a minimalist lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The spareness of the cake decorations was unintentional but looked modern.
meanings.sent4: Her spareness of words conveyed more meaning than lengthy explanations.
meanings.sent5: The spareness of the landscape highlighted the beauty of each individual tree.

meanings.definition: The act of refraining from using or consuming something.
meanings.sent1: His spareness in spending money allowed him to save for a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: The spareness of her diet was due to health reasons.
meanings.sent3: The spareness of his jokes made them even funnier.
meanings.sent4: Her spareness in sharing personal information made her mysterious to others.
meanings.sent5: The spareness of his wardrobe reflected his practical approach to clothing.
